qa_pair.question: Find all VCNs that have more than 10 subnets configured. How many such VCNs exist across all compartments?
Identify the VCN with the largest CIDR block (most IP addresses available). What is the CIDR prefix length (e.g., 16, 20, 24)?
Find all subnets that are configured as public (have route to Internet Gateway). How many public subnets exist?
List all Load Balancers with bandwidth greater than 100 Mbps. What is the display name of the one with the highest bandwidth?
Find VCNs that have peering connections to other VCNs. How many VCN peering connections exist in total?
Identify the security list with the most ingress rules. How many ingress rules does it have?
Find all NAT Gateways that are currently in AVAILABLE state. How many are there?
Calculate the total number of reserved public IPs across all compartments. What is the count?
Find subnets that have security lists allowing ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 on port 22 (SSH). How many such subnets exist?
Identify the Load Balancer with the most backend servers configured. What is the total backend server count?
